item.description:
Dear Westborough spirituality meetup group member,

How are you?

Spring is here now! We have been like a seed hide under ground and wait for this sunny weather to wake up. It seems we are oneness and wait to be awaken.

This is a new topic about "ONENESS"!

I found this interesting youtube on line.

It brings up a good topic for us to discuss.

What does oneness mean to you?

Join me for this discussion and we can take a little walk after discussion, If the weather is nice.

Please check this out

Thank you

PS: I am not promoting any books or videos.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PvSp1k3Lw4A

 

   Jonathan
item.how_to_find_us: 2nd building on the right when you drive into the condos, #19 will be the meetup
item.why: We always have a great discussion and we share a lot of informations
item.name: Westborough Spiritual May Meetup
